name: Virus Defense (Sheldon Chong)
description:
Virus Defense is a strategic Tower Defense game. Your aim is to defend the hospital against incoming waves of viruses by placing down turrets in strategic locations to attack the incoming waves of viruses.

How to Play:

Place down turrets that will attack the incoming waves of viruses.

To begin the wave, click the “Play” button. 

You start with 5 hearts (lives) and 30 Energy Points. You must prevent the viruses from reaching the hospital. Each time a virus manages to reach the hospital, the hospital will lose a heart. Once all hearts reach 0, it’s game over.

Energy is obtained by defeating viruses. Energy can be used to place down more turrets or upgrade them. To upgrade a placed turret, click on it, and select one of the 3 upgrades presented to you.

To win the game, you must protect the hospital from 10 waves of viruses, each wave increasing in difficulty.
